==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
{{Ancient Name|bearer=1}} Kibangu is a seasoned and renowned warrior from the [[Scions of the Canopy]]. At the [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame]] that the Traveler attended in Natlan, he was one of the 5 victors who were sent to fight in the [[Night Warden Wars]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame (Quest)}}</ref>

==Trivia==
* ''Kibangu'' is a name of {{w|Congo}} origins. {{w|Kibangou}} is also a town in the {{w|Niari Department}} of the {{w|Republic of the Congo}}.
